price: Isiniif beyladoota keessa waan xiinxaltantu jira, Waan garaalee isaanii keessa jiru irraas (aannan) isin obaafna, Ammas isiniif ishee keessa bu’aalee (biraa) baay’eetu jira. Ishee irraas ni nyaattu.
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ لَعِبۡرَةٗۖ نُّسۡقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِي بُطُونِهَا وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ كَثِيرَةٞ وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lakum fī al-anʿāmi laʿib'ratan nus'qīkum mimmā fī buṭūnihā walakum fīhā manāfiʿu kathīratun wamin'hā takulūna
